org.apache.samoa.topology

Interface ComponentFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FlinkComponentFactory, S4ComponentFactory, SamzaComponentFactory, SimpleComponentFactory, StormComponentFactory, ThreadsComponentFactory

    public interface ComponentFactory
    ComponentFactory interface. Provides platform specific components.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EntranceProcessingItem createEntrancePi(EntranceProcessor entranceProcessor)
      Creates a platform specific processing item with the specified processor that is the entrance point in the topology.
      ProcessingItem createPi(Processor processor)
      Creates a platform specific processing item with the specified processor.
      ProcessingItem createPi(Processor processor, int parallelism)
      Creates a platform specific processing item with the specified processor.
      Stream createStream(IProcessingItem sourcePi)
      Creates a platform specific stream.
      Topology createTopology(String topoName)
      Creates a platform specific topology.

    • Method Detail

      • createPi

        ProcessingItem createPi(Processor processor)
        Creates a platform specific processing item with the specified processor.
        Parameters:
        processor - contains the logic for this processing item.
        Returns:
        ProcessingItem

      • createPi

        ProcessingItem createPi(Processor processor,
                        int parallelism)
        Creates a platform specific processing item with the specified processor. Additionally sets the parallelism level.
        Parameters:
        processor - contains the logic for this processing item.
        parallelism - defines the amount of instances of this processing item will be created.
        Returns:
        ProcessingItem

      • createEntrancePi

        EntranceProcessingItem createEntrancePi(EntranceProcessor entranceProcessor)
        Creates a platform specific processing item with the specified processor that is the entrance point in the topology. This processing item can either generate a stream of data or connect to an external stream of data.
        Parameters:
        entranceProcessor - contains the logic for this processing item.
        Returns:
        EntranceProcessingItem

      • createStream

        Stream createStream(IProcessingItem sourcePi)
        Creates a platform specific stream.
        Parameters:
        sourcePi - source processing item which will provide the events for this stream.
        Returns:
        Stream

      • createTopology

        Topology createTopology(String topoName)
        Creates a platform specific topology.
        Parameters:
        topoName - Topology name.
        Returns:
        Topology
